Name: COMPLEX a VR Puzzle Game
About the game: ********** C O M P L E X a VR Puzzle Game ************ ** Complex is a puzzle game from 2018 and was my first game as a single developer.It´s a bit older now but if you like puzzle games ,this could be interesting for you.It´s a puzzle based game for HTC(Vive) and Oculus VR Systems (Rift/Quest/Quest2/RiftS) ( no Index , no WMR support) ** And if you want try my new Game from 2021 , with Valve Index Support and HP Reverb G2 support then look for my newest game ********** ' ORKANA CONFLICT VR ' ********** new VR RTS/SHOOTER Hybrid to Complex VR: - 30 Levels for you brain and your skill (first 7-8 levels are very simple ,but PLEASE continue playing ! ) - many many level to think , solve and combine thinks to solve the level. - You need skill, remembrance, logic, combination, sometimes speed, sometimes assessment reproducing - playtime are 2h-4h; for very (very) fast player about 1.5 hours - enjoy and have fun - Game and Sound by A.K(me) - Music by me and freesounds from bensound - Sound and Effects made with FruityLoops ,CCO Sound Effect from online ressources - about 0,8 - 1 Gb Hard Disk Space - development time 6 month. IMPORTANT: - use Button A for selecting in menue (not Trigger) - (known bug: it can happen that one hand can no longer grip. Then please use the other hand, after 1 or 2 minutes it works again. The levels can all be solved and there is a lot of variety and fun for you(hopefully :) )
